headline: Races to Watch on Tuesday as Primary Season Kicks Off
author: Bill Powell
sentences: If Vance wins the Ohio primary, he will likely face off against 10-term U.S. Representative Tim Ryan, who is an increasingly rare breed in today's Democratic party: a relatively conservative, blue collar Democrat who tries to appeal to working class voters.
